name: Tax on Tailing Creation
description:
Every Tailing created will be taxed with 1â‚¬, unless the Citizen has proven to the Federal Secretary of Waste Storage that their Tailings Depot is sufficient to store their Tailings.
A part of this tax can be recovered by selling the Tailings to the Federal Waste Storage Facility.
